thread.title: BRIEF-Instagram Introduces Changes To Give Users More Control Over Feed

title: BRIEF-Instagram Introduces Changes To Give Users More Control Over Feed
text: March 22, 2018 / 3:28 PM / Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-Instagram Introduces Changes To Give Users More Control Over Feed Reuters Staff March 22 (Reuters) - Instagram: * INSTAGRAM SAYS INTRODUCING CHANGES TO GIVE USERS MORE CONTROL OVER THEIR FEED * INSTAGRAM SAYS TESTING A “NEW POSTS” BUTTON THAT LETS USERS CHOOSE WHEN THEY WANT TO REFRESH, RATHER THAN IT HAPPENING AUTOMATICALLY * INSTAGRAM SAYS ALSO MAKING CHANGES TO ENSURE THAT NEWER POSTS ARE MORE LIKELY TO APPEAR FIRST IN FEED Source text : ( bit.ly/2FUk4Sg ) Further company coverage:
